mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.user_id, u.username, f.title, f.content, f.contact, f.status, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_feedback_reply WHERE feedback_id = f.id) as reply_count, f.created_at, f.updated_at FROM sys_feedback f LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON f.user_id = u.id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY f.created_at DESC
